# Advanced ggplot2 and Multi-Panel Plots

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this chapter, you will be able to:

1. Create faceted plots with `facet_wrap()` and `facet_grid()`
2. Add statistical layers and trend lines
3. Customize themes extensively
4. Work with color palettes
5. Combine multiple plots using `cowplot` and `patchwork`
